main.title:
Hi,
I'm Frank!
main.subtitle: I'm a mobile and web developer with an eye for graphics and design, who loves to work using the best practices.

hair_express.desc: I entirely designed and worked on this hybrid mobile app for a growing hair salon, mainly useful to manage appointments.

tboxchain.desc: TBoxChain is a mobile app that takes care of certifying reviews, and that focuses on two keywords: Proof of location and Proof of identity.

smartxp.desc: SmartXP is a multi-company dashboard that allows to manage data for the mobile apps of a sports society.

contact.title: Contact me!
contact.subtitle: Feel free to contact me. I'm available to discussions about your project or for a work proposal.
